question:
On a recent holiday, you lost a valubale item. Fortunately, you have travel insurance to cover the cost of anything lost.
Write a letter to the manager of your insurance company, in your letter
- Describe the item you lost
- Explain how you lost it
-Tell the insurance company what you would like them to do
text: I am writing this letter regarding the belonging that was left during my last vacation Let me introduce myself, my name is Ali Hammoud, and I have been a client of this company for three years.

As a matter of fact, the item was an iPad that I am used to travelling with in order to manage my work from distance. Moreover, the tablet is coloured with white where my name is written in bold on the back cover.

In fact, I was on a tourist trip to a natural preserve when the gadget was discovered to be unfound in the middle of the road. Furthermore, I found that my backpack was opened accidentally which leads to a potential theft inside the bus.

I would recommend contacting the local authorities in the region who may cooperate to search for the lost item. Otherwise, I kindly demand a full refund as mentioned in the insurance contract under these kinds of circumstances.
Your prompt action is highly required.
